갑옷

ARMOR

In general, magic 갑옷 protects the wearer to a 상급 extent than nonmagical 갑옷. Magic 갑옷 보너스 are enhancement 보너스, never rise above +5, and stack with regular 갑옷 보너스(and with 방패 and magic 방패 enhancement 보너스). All magic 갑옷 is also 명품 갑옷, reducing 갑옷 check 페널티 by 1.

In addition to an enhancement 보너스, 갑옷 may have 특수 능력. 특수 능력 usually count as additional 보너스 for determining the market value of an item, but do not improve AC. A suit of 갑옷 cannot have an effective 보너스(enhancement plus special ability 보너스 equivalents) higher than +10. A suit of 갑옷 with a special ability must have at least a +1 enhancement 보너스.

A suit of 갑옷 or a 방패 may be made of an unusual material. Roll d%: 01–95 indicates that the item is of a standard sort, and 96–100 indicates that it is made of a special material.

갑옷 is always created so that even if the type of 갑옷 comes with boots or gauntlets, these pieces can be switched for other magic boots or gauntlets.

Activation: Usually a character benefits from magic 갑옷 및 방패 in exactly the way a character benefits from nonmagical 갑옷 및 방패—by wearing them. If 갑옷 or a 방패 has a special ability that the user needs to activate then the user usually needs to utter 명령 word (a standard action).

비표준 규격 갑옷: The cost of 갑옷 for nonhumanoid creatures, as well as for creatures who are neither Small nor Medium, varies. The cost of the masterwork quality and any magical enhancement remains the same.
